statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT MIN(consumption) AS min_consumption, AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_id, date, consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT date, building_id, consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption > 1000
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT building_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_consumption > 5000
SELECT building_id, AVG(consumption) AS average_consumption FROM GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY average_consumption DESC
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_consumption FROM GreenBuildings
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM GreenBuildings
SELECT building_name, AVG(energy_consumption) AS average_consumption FROM GreenBuildings GROUP BY building_name
SELECT * FROM ConsumptionData WHERE consumption_value > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE energy_consumption > 1000
SELECT building_name, energy_consumption FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT building_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM GreenBuildings JOIN ConsumptionData ON GreenBuildings.building_id = ConsumptionData.building_id GROUP BY building_name
SELECT building_name, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM GreenBuildings GROUP BY building_name HAVING avg_energy_consumption > 500

SELECT building_name, consumption_date, consumption_value FROM GreenBuildings JOIN ConsumptionData ON GreenBuildings.building_id = ConsumptionData.building_id WHERE consumption_value > 200 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM green_buildings;
SELECT MAX(build_year) FROM green_buildings;
SELECT energy_consumed, consumption_date FROM energy_consumption WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM building_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM green_buildings ORDER BY building_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT gb.building_name, ea.analysis_date, ea.analysis_result FROM green_buildings gb INNER JOIN building_analysis ea ON gb.building_id = ea.building_id WHERE ea.analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM green_buildings WHERE building_location LIKE '%New%' OR build_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM green_buildings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM green_buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000;

SELECT building_name, energy_sources.source_type FROM green_buildings INNER JOIN building_energy_sources ON green_buildings.building_id = building_energy_sources.building_id INNER JOIN energy_sources ON building_energy_sources.source_id = energy_sources.source_id;
SELECT building_name, consumption_kwh FROM green_buildings LEFT JOIN energy_consumption_data ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id;
SELECT building_name, location FROM green_buildings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM green_buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT building_name, consumption_kwh FROM green_buildings JOIN energy_consumption_data ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id WHERE consumption_kwh > 100;

SELECT green_buildings.building_name, energy_sources.source_type FROM green_buildings JOIN building_energy_sources ON green_buildings.building_id = building_energy_sources.building_id JOIN energy_sources ON building_energy_sources.source_id = energy_sources.source_id;

SELECT building_name, construction_year, consumption_kwh FROM green_buildings JOIN energy_consumption_data ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id WHERE construction_year = 2010 OR consumption_kwh < 50;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_type FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT building_id, build_year FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Office';

SELECT energy_consumption.building_id, record_date, electricity_usage, gas_usage FROM energy_consumption JOIN buildings ON energy_consumption.building_id = buildings.building_id WHERE electricity_usage > 100;
SELECT building_name, saving_date, electricity_savings, gas_savings FROM energy_savings JOIN buildings ON energy_savings.building_id = buildings.building_id ORDER BY saving_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_type FROM buildings
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_type, build_year FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Commercial' ORDER BY building_name DESC

SELECT ec.building_id, ec.record_date, ec.electricity_usage, ec.gas_usage, es.electricity_savings, es.gas_savings FROM energy_consumption ec INNER JOIN energy_savings es ON ec.building_id = es.building_id

SELECT bm.building_id, bm.metric_date, bm.energy_performance_score, ec.electricity_cost, ec.gas_cost FROM building_metrics bm LEFT JOIN energy_costs ec ON bm.metric_id = ec.record_id ORDER BY bm.metric_date ASC
